channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024030506
item.description:
Report X-2024030506

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: BROCKTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE HANDLER WAS LOADING BOX ONTO VAN AND NOTICED CONTENTS WAS LEAKING OUT OF THE BOX .QA WAS CALLED TO INSPECT THE PACKAGE UPON FURTHER INSPECTION BOTTOM OF PALE WAS CRACKED AND CONTENTS LEAKING OUT DescribePack: 1/3 OF BOTTOM OF PALE WAS CRACKED DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE BROUGHT OVER TO THE QA CAGE
